resources.string: Choose the method you want to use to invite or link others
Copy this code, open a Matter-enabled app, and enter the code when prompted. This code will expire in 3 minutes
To allow others to control this device, they need to open a Matter-enabled app on their phone or tablet and scan this QR code. This code will expire in 3 minutes
Something went wrong while trying to generate the device share payload. Please make sure that your device is online
Please wait while we set up the device for sharing. This will only take a couple of minutes.
